channel.title: Lancaster on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in Lancaster on News Lancashire

item.title: #GreenParty has a chance to make a big breakthrough in #GortonAndDenton: door knocking data is very promising. We have a...
item.description: #GreenParty has a chance to make a big breakthrough in #GortonAndDenton: door knocking data is very promising. We have a brilliant local candidate, Hannah Spencer. We are being outspent massively by #Reform and #Labour. Donations can help deliver Hope not Hate.

item.title: Alcohol deaths are at record highs. As @catsmithmp.bsky.social MP writes, we need action now. Minimum Unit Pricing in E...
item.description: Alcohol deaths are at record highs. As @catsmithmp.bsky.social MP writes, we need action now. Minimum Unit Pricing in England would save lives, reduce inequality, and support our pubs. “But crucially, no single policy will be… www.politicshome.com/opinion/arti… - @politicshome.bsky.social Source: Cat Smith MP (Bluesky)

item.title: Alcohol harm is a public health crisis, yet industry lobbying is blocking the action we know works. We must put people‚Äô...
item.description: Alcohol harm is a public health crisis, yet industry lobbying is blocking the action we know works. We must put people‚Äôs health before profits, protect children, and back evidence-based policy to reduce harm and ease pressure on our NHS. labourlist.org/2026/02/alco… #PublicHealth #AlcoholHarm

item.title: Does the elections white paper go far enough? On 24 October, join @catsmithmp.bsky.social, @rosewhiff.bsky.social, Tom...
item.description: Does the elections white paper go far enough? On 24 October, join @catsmithmp.bsky.social, @rosewhiff.bsky.social, Tom Hawthorn and David Howarth at our free, online event to consider if the government’s plans are sufficient to ensure electoral integrity. Sign up üëâ www.ucl.ac.uk/social-histo….

item.title: I have granted the following urgent question in the @houseofcommons.parliament.uk today. From Mike Wood MP to ask Dar...
item.description: I have granted the following urgent question in the @houseofcommons.parliament.uk today. From Mike Wood MP to ask Darren Jones MP, Chancellor of the Duchy of Lancaster, if he will make a statement on the Government‚Äôs policy on mandatory digital ID.

item.title: I spoke yesterday in the House of Commons about the Epstein and Mandelson scandal and how this is the moment when we sho...
item.description: I spoke yesterday in the House of Commons about the Epstein and Mandelson scandal and how this is the moment when we should draw a line under a culture where talent or connections overrides bad behaviour, character or judgement Source: Lizzi Collinge MP (Bluesky)

item.title: I‚Äôm running the Great Scottish Run for Medical Aid for Palestinians who do life saving work in unthinkable circumstances...
item.description: I‚Äôm running the Great Scottish Run for Medical Aid for Palestinians who do life saving work in unthinkable circumstances. As I set off, I‚Äôve raised ¬£4,903 for some of the world‚Äôs most vulnerable people. If you can, you can pledge your support here: www.

item.title: It‚Äôs great to join the many fantastic volunteers in Gorton today, including this gorgeous lot! Can‚Äôt wait for our Labou...
item.description: It‚Äôs great to join the many fantastic volunteers in Gorton today, including this gorgeous lot! Can‚Äôt wait for our Labour candidate, Angeliki Stogia, to build on her brilliant track record of change by becoming the next MP for Gorton and Denton.

item.title: Labour's investment in clean energy upgrades for public buildings continues! The next round of 190 sites across 82 NHS...
item.description: Labour’s investment in clean energy upgrades for public buildings continues! The next round of 190 sites across 82 NHS Trusts, 8 military sites and 1 prison have been announced to receive part of ¬£72m for clean energy technology upgrades and to improve energy efficiency.

item.title: Mandelson‚Äôs malign influence runs right through the heart of this Government. Not least in the govt‚Äôs NHS data deal wit...
item.description: Mandelson‚Äôs malign influence runs right through the heart of this Government. Not least in the govt‚Äôs NHS data deal with Palantir ‚Äì a spy-tech firm co-founded by a man who thinks the NHS should be ‚Äòripped up.‚Äô I’ve written to Wes Streeting urging him to ditch this dangerous deal.

item.description: People are struggling. We need to lower bills, protect our NHS and rebuild our public services. My interview with #BBCLauraK Great to see Green Party membership rising once again! youtu.be/lMmDM_PvHyc?… Source: North Lancs Greens (Bluesky)

item.title: Read more about the work of @commonsproccom.parliament.uk which I chair. From proxy voting to the way in which select...
item.description: Read more about the work of @commonsproccom.parliament.uk which I chair. From proxy voting to the way in which select committee chairs get elected. We are busy reviewing the procedures of the House of Commons and, hopefully, recommending improvements! www.politicshome.com/opinion/arti… Source: Cat Smith MP (Bluesky)

item.title: Starmer challenges politicians "like the Reform candidate for Denton & Gorton who look at people like Rishi Sunak and Sh...
item.description: Starmer challenges politicians “like the Reform candidate for Denton & Gorton who look at people like Rishi Sunak and Shabana Mahmood - and presumably Marcus Rashford, Shirley Bassey and Anas Sarwar - and say they can’t really be English or Welsh or Scottish, because they are not white”

item.title: Today our government ensured 10 sick children arrived in the UK for treatment. With hospitals decimated in Gaza this was...
item.description: Today our government ensured 10 sick children arrived in the UK for treatment. With hospitals decimated in Gaza this was a life-saving effort. But, for those still trapped, Medical Aid for Palestinians works on the ground. I‚Äôm running a half marathon for them: www.

item.title: UHMBT recently announced plans to close 24 patient rehabilitation beds at the Royal Lancaster Infirmary to save money....
item.description: UHMBT recently announced plans to close 24 patient rehabilitation beds at the Royal Lancaster Infirmary to save money. Green County Councillor Hamish Mills, Chair of the Health Scrutiny Committee has ensured that there will now be public consultation. www.bbc.co.uk/news/article… Source: North Lancs Greens (Bluesky)

item.title: Was once made to wait to board an EasyJet flight at Geneva, it turned out because Geri Halliwell and Robbie Williams wan...
item.description: Was once made to wait to board an EasyJet flight at Geneva, it turned out because Geri Halliwell and Robbie Williams wanted to get on first. I still don‚Äôt understand why they did it that way - they sat at the front and the whole plane rubbernecked as we filed past.

item.title: We are delighted to welcome @catsmithmp.bsky.social as our newest Parliamentary Champion! We would like to thank Cat an...
item.description: We are delighted to welcome @catsmithmp.bsky.social as our newest Parliamentary Champion! We would like to thank Cat and we look forward to working with her. Read more here: www.actionforme.org.uk/cat-smith-mp… Source: Cat Smith MP (Bluesky)

item.title: Say yes to the dress at Lancaster hospice prom dress sale
item.description: St John‚Äôs Hospice in Lancaster is hosting a pre-loved prom dress sale. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Honour for volunteer blood biker who died in Lancaster collision
item.description: A volunteer blood biker who died while delivering emergency samples has been posthumously awarded the prestigious Elizabeth Emblem. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Investors seal ¬£80m refinance deal for Lancaster and Leeds student schemes
item.description: A pair of purpose-built student housing developments located in Lancaster and Leeds have been refinanced in an ¬£80m deal. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Former Morecambe FC player exposed as head of massive drug ring after making ex-club his password
item.description: A former Morecambe FC player has been exposed as a major drug dealer after making the rookie mistake of using the name of one of his old clubs as a phone password. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Firefighters called to road traffic collision in Lancaster
item.description: Firefighters went to the scene of a road traffic collision in Lancaster. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Lancaster businesses vote ‚Äòyes‚Äô to BID
item.description: Businesses in Lancaster have voted yes to continuing the city centre‚Äôs BID for a further five years. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Council leader to give keynote lecture on future of local government amid Lancashire shake-up
item.description: The leader of Preston City Council will set out his vision for the future of local government at a special event to be held at Lancaster University next week. Source: Blackpool Gazette

item.title: Preston leader to give keynote lecture on future of local government amid Lancashire shake-up
item.description: The leader of Preston City Council will set out his vision for the future of local government at a special event to be held at Lancaster University next week. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Readers' 18 top restaurants for a romantic Valentine's Day meal in Morecambe and Lancaster
item.description: They say that the way to a person‚Äôs heart is through their stomach. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Morecambe teen slapped with football banning order
item.description: A Morecambe teenager has been slapped with a four year football banning order. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Court round-up for Lancaster and Morecambe
item.description: The following people were dealt with by magistrates at Lancaster and Burnley: Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Fresh calls to fix botched south Lancaster housing estate after four years of misery
item.description: Residents facing problems and costly repairs at a half-built housing estate near Lancaster are again calling on a developer to fix things and for more action by authorities. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Morecambe Bay hospitals trust award of ¬£887k will help reduce energy bills
item.description: University Hospitals of Morecambe Bay NHS Foundation Trust (UHMBT) has been successful in its bid for national funding to install clean energy upgrades which will help to reduce energy bills. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Lancaster cancer charity¬†puts supporters in control of how donations are¬†spent
item.description: A charity that supports people affected by cancer and bereavement has launched a new fundraising initiative that gives supporters greater control over how their donations are spent. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Eyesore Morecambe hotel goes under the hammer again
item.description: A prominent and iconic former pub and hotel in Morecambe is again up for auction after failing to be snapped up at an auction in January. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Lancaster named one of the best places to live if you are under 35 by the Times
item.description: A city in Lancashire has been named amongst the best places to live as a young professional. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Jim Bentley hopes Morecambe's supporters will get the Mazuma Mobile Stadium 'bouncing'
item.description: Jim Bentley is hoping for some vociferous support as he prepares for his first home match back in charge of Morecambe. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Lancaster haulage firm stands the test of time and is still operating after nearly 100 years
item.description: Wray historian David Kenyon looks at the history of S.J.Bargh Ltd Haulage Contractors. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Motorists banned from stopping on road by Lancaster school under new order
item.description: An order banning motorists from stopping on a stretch of road close to a Lancaster primary school has been passed. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Award-winning folk singer and songwriter comes to Lancaster
item.description: Award-winning folk singer and songwriter Emily Portman returns to the road this March and arrives in Lancaster on March 19. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: H.G. Wells‚Äôs iconic science fiction tale comes to Lancaster‚Äôs The Dukes
item.description: This year, imitating the dog, one of the UK‚Äôs most original and innovative theatre companies is set to push their inventive storytelling to new heights when they stage a contemporary retelling of H.G Wells‚Äôs iconic science fiction tale The War of the Worlds.

item.title: Campaigners¬†urge housing developer Wrenman Homes 'to find another field' for 200 homes plan in Lancaster
item.description: Campaigners are anxiously awaiting a decision this month on plans for a development on green belt land in Bolton-le-Sands. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Lancaster business owner shares national stage at UK‚Äôs largest retail trade show
item.description: A Lancaster boutique owner has spoken at Spring Fair 2026, the UK‚Äôs largest retail trade show. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Affordable homes plan for site on edge of Lancaster in line for go-ahead
item.description: Plans for 31 new affordable homes to be built on the edge of Lancaster are to be discussed by councillors later this month. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Prestigious award for Morecambe Bay hospitals trust doctor
item.description: A doctor at the Morecambe Bay hospitals trust has won a prestigious award. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: January gallery: 13 images that show off a winter wonderland in Lancaster and Morecambe
item.description: January was a bitterly cold month at times, but that didn‚Äôt stop intrepid photographers getting out and about. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Police appeal for owner of stolen mobility scooter to come forward after it was abandoned on Morecambe street
item.description: Police are looking for the owner of a mobility scooter found abandoned on a Morecambe street. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Marshall targets play-offs after 'sloppy' spell for Lancaster
item.description: ‚ÄãLancaster City’s long-awaited return to Northern Premier League action at the Giant Axe has yielded four points from two games and boss Jimmy Marshall hopes his side can now climb back into the play-off zone. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Campaigners¬†plea to developers as decision set to be made on Lancaster village housing
item.description: Campaigners are anxiously awaiting a decision this month on plans for a development on green belt land in Bolton-le-Sands. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Rogue roofer jailed for a year after scamming elderly Morecambe residents out of thousands of pounds
item.description: A rogue roofer who scammed three elderly residents out of thousands of pounds has been jailed for 12 months after a Trading Standards investigation. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.title: Lancaster lecture will provide glimpse into future of region
item.description: As part of an exploration of the different ways of connecting with the north-west region ‚Äì responding to the debate around English Devolution ‚Äì Lancaster University has organised a lecture to be given by the Leader of Preston City Council.

item.title: Firefighters tackle blaze at house in Lancaster
item.description: Firefighters tackled a blaze at a house in Lancaster. Source: Lancaster Guardian

item.description: Israel has committed genocide in Gaza, says UN inquiry Source: Cat Smith MP (Bluesky)
